sentence: take the blue block in the rear center and put it to the front side of the previous blue block
take the blue block in the rear center and place it in front of the blue block which is in front of the purple block
rotate the leftmost blue block by 30 degrees and align it with the blue block you just moved
rotate the leftmost blue block by 30 degrees and align it with the foremost blue block
pick up the left one among the blue blocks that you did not move yet and align it in front of the block you just moved
